q7-1-gravitational-force.title: Gravitational Force F ∝ 1/r²
q7-1-gravitational-force.description: Visualize how gravitational force varies with distance between two masses. F = GMm/r².

q7-3-orbital-motion.title: Orbital Motion & Kepler's Third Law
q7-3-orbital-motion.description: Observe circular orbital motion with velocity tangent to path. T² ∝ R³.

q7-8-comet-orbit.title: Orbital Motion (Kepler)
q7-8-comet-orbit.description: Circular orbit: angular momentum and total energy conserved.
